landing.noapp: Awudingi uhlelo lokusebenza ukusebenzisa {{ BRAND }} efonini noma kuthebhulethi yakho! Iwebhusayithi isebenza kahle kumakhalekhukhwini.
landing.intro: I-{{BRAND}} ({{TRANSLITERATION}}) iyindlela enhle yokuhlangana nabangane abasha. Uma usebenzisa i-{{ BRAND }}, sikhetha omunye umuntu ngokungahleliwe futhi sikuvumele ukuthi nikhulume ubuso nobuso. Ukukusiza ukuthi uhlale uphephile, izingxoxo aziziwa ngaphandle kwalapho utshela othile ukuthi ungubani (akunconyiwe!), futhi ungamisa ingxoxo noma nini. Bona <6>Imigomo nemibandela</6> yethu, kanye <8>nemihlahlandlela yomphakathi</8> ukuze uthole ulwazi mayelana nokufanele ukwenze nokungafanele usebenzise i-{{ BRAND }}. {{ BRAND }} ingxoxo yevidiyo ilinganiselwe nge-AI kodwa akukho ukulinganisela okuhle. Abasebenzisi banesibopho kuphela ngokuziphatha kwabo ngenkathi besebenzisa i-{{ BRAND }}
landing.disclaimer: <0>Kufanele ube neminyaka engu-18 (noma iningi elisemthethweni endaweni yakho) noma ngaphezulu ukuze usebenzise {{BRAND}}</0>. Bona <4>Imigomo nemibandela</4> ye-{{BRAND}} ukuze uthole ulwazi olwengeziwe. Ukuvikelwa kokulawula kwabazali okungase kusize abazali ukuthi batholakale ngokwezentengiso futhi ungathola ulwazi olwengeziwe kokuthi <6>https://www.connectsafely.org/controls</6> kanye namanye amasayithi.
landing.pleaseleave: Sicela ushiye i-Lamdazle futhi uvakashele isayithi yabantu abadala uma kuyilokho okufunayo futhi uneminyaka engu-18 (noma iningi elisemthethweni endaweni yakho) noma ngaphezulu.
landing.termscheck: Ngokuqoka ibhokisi uyavuma ukuthi ubuyekeze ukuvuma kwakho ukuboshwa <3>Imigomo nemibandela</3>, <5>Inqubomgomo Yobumfihlo</5> kanye <7>nemihlahlandlela yomphakathi</7 ye-{{BRAND}}. >.
landing.agecheck: Akumele usebenzise le sevisi uma ungaphansi kweminyaka engu-18 noma uneminyaka yobudala yeningi elisemthethweni endaweni yakho. Bona <1>Imigomo nemibandela</1> yethu ukuze uthole ulwazi olwengeziwe. <3>Ngokukhetha ibhokisi uyavuma futhi umela ukuthi uneminyaka engu-18 (noma iningi elisemthethweni endaweni yakho) noma ngaphezulu.</3>

chat.error: Iphutha ekuxhumekeni kuseva: Sicela uzame futhi

search.retry: Lokhu kuthatha isikhathi eside, ngifuna umuntu ongamazi esikhundleni...

chat.connected: Uxoxa nomuntu ongamazi nje. Ithi Sawubona...
chat.stopped: Chofoza Qala ukuze uxoxe nomuntu ongamazi
chat.language: Nobabili nikhuluma ulimi olufanayo. Khetha i-{{"Any"}} kumenyu yolimi ukuze uyikhubaze.
chat.simulated: Umuntu ongamazi kungenzeka usebenzisa ikhamera yewebhu elingisiwe

alerts.keepclean: Kugcine kuhlanzekile futhi usize ngokubika ukuziphatha kwe-NSFW
alerts.banreason: Ngenxa yokuziphatha okubi. Ungakhathazeki, ukuvinjelwa ngeke kuhlale unomphela.

error.adblocker: Asikwazi ukukuvumela ukuthi wenze lokho ngoba usebenzisa i-Ad blocker
error.disableadblocker: <0>Sithemba ukuthi uyayijabulela iwebhusayithi yethu. Ukuze uqhubeke nokuyisebenzisa, sithanda ukukucela ukuthi ukhubaze ngomusa i-adblocker yakho. Iwebhusayithi yethu imahhala ukuyisebenzisa, futhi izikhangiso ezivezwa kuwebhusayithi yethu zisisiza ukuthi sikhokhele izindleko zokuqhuba isevisi. Ngokukhubaza i-adblocker yakho, uzobe usisiza ukuthi sigcine iwebhusayithi yethu isebenza.</0><1>Siyabonga ngokuseseka kwakho!</1>
error.errormessage: Lokhu kuyabangela amahloni... Kube khona i
